entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ignore issue comments starting with "Looks like this PR hasn't been active for some time..." #53859
  • Intermediate MTLS certificates ignored by certificate authentication #53858
  • AddEndpointFilterFactory not working? #53855
  • Perf regression: plaintext #53848
  • ErrorBoundary not working with Blazor App with Interactive Auto #53840
  • Error: System.InvalidOperationException: Method calls cannot be formatted in InputNumber & InputTextArea #53834
  • HTTP POST and PUT requests fail with "The response ended prematurely" #53833
  • .NET 8 migration from WASM to Blazor Web App - environment not set correctly #53832
  • Error "InvalidOperationException: Sequence contains more than one matching element" in Swagger when using multiple [FromForm] parameters in Minimal API #53831
  • Unable to resolve service for type 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.IHubContext`1[ xxx ]' while attempting to activate ' xxx '. #53830
  • Perf regression: fortunes, mapaction #53829

PullRequests

Created

  • Support key deletion in Data Protection #53860
    area-dataprotection
  • [release/6.0] Update yarn.msbuild #53851
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Update yarn.msbuild #53850
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Update Yarn.msbuild #53849
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4565741` to `4872968` #53846
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `dddb219` to `4872968` #53845
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [Blazor] Websocket compression API review feedback #53835
    area-blazor

Merged

  • [release/8.0] [Component governance] Bump the Azure.Identity dependency #53774
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Correctly encode non-ASCII characters in redirect URL #53642
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4565741` to `4872968` #53847
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix `@key` not being respected for interactive WebAssembly components after publish #53748
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] Fix stale values from `[SupplyParameterFromQuery]` #53625
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] Fix duplicate route detection of actions with route parameters #53604
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] Fix navigation for anchor inside <svg> element #53541
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.3
  • [Blazor] Fixes encoded `/` on Blazor Router #53538
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] Add ForgotPasswordRequest to STJ source generation context #52830
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-identity, community-contribution, 8.0.3
  • Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient version to 4.0.5 #53772
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.3
  • Update Selenium #53775
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.3
  • Upgrade karma-firefox-launcher to v2 #53787
    area-infrastructure, area-signalr, tell-mode, 6.0.28
  • [release/7.0] Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient version to 4.0.5 #53770
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.17
  • [release/8.0] [Component governance] Bump the Azure.Identity dependency #53716
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.3
  • Update branding to 7.0.17 #53853
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.17
  • Update branding to 8.0.3 #53854
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.3
  • Update branding to 6.0.28 #53852
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.28
  • Update milestones for March #53857
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2
  • Fix 'action: null' in Policyboy #53856
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4565741` to `4872968` #53844
    area-infrastructure
  • FabricBot: Onboarding to GitOps.ResourceManagement because of FabricBot decommissioning #53753
    area-infrastructure
  • Don't auto-update the update-dotnet-sdk action #53843
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix Policybot #53841
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Fix casing of ProblemDetails for RFC compliance #53792
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] Fix closing SignalR Websocket connection on server close #53408
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Avoid fetching new page content when only the hash changes #53542
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • Update Microsoft.Data.SqlClient version to 2.1.7 #53771
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Move SB metadata to intermediates #53749
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Prevent error boundaries from handling exceptions of type `NavigationException` #53826
    area-blazor
  • http.sys: Allow configuring HTTP_AUTH_EX_FLAGs as options #51833
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Add unit test to confirm change token is disposed during #53827
    area-blazor
